#Test Rule 06
#There are no more than two blue structures in the grid

1,1,B,Expected:Success (only two Blue Structure in the grid)

11,2,B,Expected:Success (only two Blue Structure in the grid) 
11,1,B,Expected:Success (only two Blue Structure in the grid) 
10,1,B,Expected:Success (only two Blue Structure in the grid) 
10,2,B,Expected:Success (only two Blue Structure in the grid) 
9,1,B,Expected:Success (only two Blue Structure in the grid) 
9,2,B,Expected:Success (only two Blue Structure in the grid)
